title: Nick Denton, Gawker Media Founder, and Jason Epstein, Investor
description:
In an episode that originally aired on Recode Decode, Gawker Media founder Nick Denton and new board member Jason Epstein sit down with Peter Kafka to discuss the online media company's rapidly changing outlook. How will Gawker react to the growing power of Facebook? And will it be set back by an incoming invasion of privacy lawsuit?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
